Anger.Name: Anger
Anger.Description: Deal 6 (8) damage. Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

Armaments.Name: Armaments
Armaments.Description: Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
Armaments.Description (Upgraded): Gain 5 Block. Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

Body Slam.Name: Body Slam
Body Slam.Description: Deal damage equal to your Block.

Clash.Name: Clash
Clash.Description: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 (18) damage.

Flex.Name: Flex
Flex.Description: Gain 2 (4) Strength. At the end of this turn, lose 2 (4) Strength.

Havoc.Name: Havoc
Havoc.Description: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

Headbutt.Name: Headbutt
Headbutt.Description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Heavy Blade.Name: Heavy Blade
Heavy Blade.Description: Deal 14 damage. Strength affects this card 3 (5) times.

Perfected Strike.Name: Perfected Strike
Perfected Strike.Description: Deal 6 damage. Deals 2 (3) additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike".

Sword Boomerang.Name: Sword Boomerang
Sword Boomerang.Description: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3 (4) times.

Thunderclap.Name: Thunderclap
Thunderclap.Description: Deal 4 (7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

True Grit.Name: True Grit
True Grit.Description: Gain 7 Block. Exhaust 1 card at random.

Warcry.Name: Warcry
Warcry.Description: Draw 1 card. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Warcry.Description (Upgraded): Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

Wild Strike.Name: Wild Strike
Wild Strike.Description: Deal 12 (17) damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.

Battle Trance.Name: Battle Trance
Battle Trance.Description: Draw 3 (4) cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

Blood for Blood.Name: Blood for Blood
Blood for Blood.Description: Costs 1 less [R] for each time you lose HP this combat. Deal 18 (22) damage.

Combust.Name: Combust
Combust.Description: At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP and deal 5 (7) damage to ALL enemies.

Dark Embrace.Name: Dark Embrace
Dark Embrace.Description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw 1 card.

Dropkick.Name: Dropkick
Dropkick.Description: Deal 5 (8) damage. If the enemy has Vulnerable, gain [R] and draw 1 card.

Dual Wield.Name: Dual Wield
Dual Wield.Description: Choose an Attack or Power card. Add a copy of that card into your hand.
Dual Wield.Description (Upgraded): Choose an Attack or Power card. Add 2 copies of that card into your hand.

Evolve.Name: Evolve
Evolve.Description: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 1 card.
Evolve.Description (Upgraded): Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 2 cards.

Feel No Pain.Name: Feel No Pain
Feel No Pain.Description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain 3 (4) Block.

Fire Breathing.Name: Fire Breathing
Fire Breathing.Description: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, deal 6 (10) damage to ALL enemies.

Flame Barrier.Name: Flame Barrier
Flame Barrier.Description: Gain 12 (16) Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 (6) damage back.

Infernal Blade.Name: Infernal Blade
Infernal Blade.Description: Add a random Attack into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Intimidate.Name: Intimidate
Intimidate.Description: Apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Metallicize.Name: Metallicize
Metallicize.Description: At the end of your turn, gain 3 (4) Block.

Power Through.Name: Power Through
Power Through.Description: Add 2 Wounds into your hand. Gain 15 (20) Block.

Rage.Name: Rage
Rage.Description: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 3 (5) Block.

Rampage.Name: Rampage
Rampage.Description: Deal 8 damage. Increase this card's damage by 5 (8) this combat.

Reckless Charge.Name: Reckless Charge
Reckless Charge.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage. Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

Rupture.Name: Rupture
Rupture.Description: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain 1 (2) Strength.

Searing Blow.Name: Searing Blow
Searing Blow.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. Can be Upgraded any number of times.

Second Wind.Name: Second Wind
Second Wind.Description: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Gain 5 (7) Block for each card Exhausted.

Sentinel.Name: Sentinel
Sentinel.Description: Gain 5 Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain [R] [R].
Sentinel.Description (Upgraded): Gain 8 Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain [R] [R] [R].

Sever Soul.Name: Sever Soul
Sever Soul.Description: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Deal 16 (22) damage.

Shockwave.Name: Shockwave
Shockwave.Description: Apply 3 (5) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Spot Weakness.Name: Spot Weakness
Spot Weakness.Description: If the enemy intends to attack, gain 3 (4) Strength.

Uppercut.Name: Uppercut
Uppercut.Description: Deal 13 damage. Apply 1 (2) Weak. Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

Whirlwind.Name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.Description: Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies X times.

Barricade.Name: Barricade
Barricade.Description: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

Berserk.Name: Berserk
Berserk.Description: Gain 2 (1) Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, gain [R].

Brutality.Name: Brutality
Brutality.Description: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.
Brutality.Description (Upgraded): Innate. At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.

Corruption.Name: Corruption
Corruption.Description: Skills cost 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.

Demon Form.Name: Demon Form
Demon Form.Description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 (3) Strength.

Double Tap.Name: Double Tap
Double Tap.Description: This turn, your next Attack is played twice.
Double Tap.Description (Upgraded): This turn, your next 2 Attacks are played twice.

Exhume.Name: Exhume
Exhume.Description: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. Exhaust.

Feed.Name: Feed
Feed.Description: Deal 10 (12) damage. If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 3 (4). Exhaust.

Fiend Fire.Name: Fiend Fire
Fiend Fire.Description: Exhaust your hand. Deal 7 (10) damage for each card Exhausted. Exhaust.

Immolate.Name: Immolate
Immolate.Description: Deal 21 (28) damage to ALL enemies. Add a Burn into your discard pile.

Juggernaut.Name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.Description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 5 (7) damage to a random enemy.

Offering.Name: Offering
Offering.Description: Lose 6 HP. Gain [R] [R]. Draw 3 (5) cards. Exhaust.

Reaper.Name: Reaper
Reaper.Description: Deal 4 (5) damage to ALL enemies. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. Exhaust.
